title: Mistrial declared in Texas ICE ambush case over attorney's civil rights shirt
desc: A judge declared a mistrial in the trial of nine defendants accused of an Antifa-led ambush at a Texas ICE facility after a defense lawyer wore a controversial T-shirt.
